meanings.definition: A group of biologically active compounds derived from arachidonic acid, involved in inflammation and allergic reactions.
meanings.sent1: Leukotrienes can cause swelling and redness during an allergic reaction.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study leukotrienes to understand how they affect the body's response to inflammation.
meanings.sent3: The leukotrienes decided to throw a party in the body, causing chaos and redness.
meanings.sent4: In the story of the body, leukotrienes are the fiery messengers of inflammation.
meanings.sent5: Imagine leukotrienes as tiny troublemakers, stirring up trouble in the body's defense system.
